Lp spaces

Let {gn}n\set{g_n}_n{gn​}n​ be a sequence of measurable functions on Rd\R^dRd, such that ∣gn(x)∣≤1\abs{g_n\p{x}} \leq 1∣gn​(x)∣≤1 for all xxx, and assume that gn→0g_n \to 0gn​→0 almost everywhere. Let f∈L1(Rd)f \in L^1\p{\R^d}f∈L1(Rd). Show that the sequence

(f∗gn)(x)=∫f(x−y)gn(y) dy→0\p{f * g_n}\p{x} = \int f\p{x - y}g_n\p{y} \,\diff{y} \to 0(f∗gn​)(x)=∫f(x−y)gn​(y)dy→0

uniformly on each compact subset of Rd\R^dRd, as n→∞n \to \inftyn→∞.
Solution.

Let KKK be a compact set and ε>0\epsilon > 0ε>0. Since f∈L1(Rd)f \in L^1\p{\R^d}f∈L1(Rd), there exists h∈C0(Rd)h \in C_0\p{\R^d}h∈C0​(Rd) such that ∥f−h∥L1<ε\norm{f - h}_{L^1} < \epsilon∥f−h∥L1​<ε by density and regularity of the Lebesgue measure. Then if EEE denotes the support of hhh and MMM the maximum of HHH, we have by Hölder's inequality for any x∈Kx \in Kx∈K

∣∫f(x−y)gn(y) dy∣≤∣∫h(x−y)gn(y) dy∣+∫∣f(x−y)−h(x−y)∣∣gn(y)∣ dy≤∣∫x+Eh(x−y)gn(y) dy∣+∫∣f(x−y)−h(x−y)∣ dy≤M∫x+E∣gn(y)∣ dy+∥f−h∥L1.\begin{aligned} \abs{\int f\p{x - y}g_n\p{y} \,\diff{y}} &\leq \abs{\int h\p{x - y}g_n\p{y} \,\diff{y}} + \int \abs{f\p{x - y} - h\p{x - y}}\abs{g_n\p{y}} \,\diff{y} \\ &\leq \abs{\int_{x + E} h\p{x - y} g_n\p{y} \,\diff{y}} + \int \abs{f\p{x - y} - h\p{x - y}} \,\diff{y} \\ &\leq M \int_{x + E} \abs{g_n\p{y}} \,\diff{y} + \norm{f - h}_{L^1}. \end{aligned}∣∣​∫f(x−y)gn​(y)dy∣∣​​≤∣∣​∫h(x−y)gn​(y)dy∣∣​+∫∣f(x−y)−h(x−y)∣∣gn​(y)∣dy≤∣∣​∫x+E​h(x−y)gn​(y)dy∣∣​+∫∣f(x−y)−h(x−y)∣dy≤M∫x+E​∣gn​(y)∣dy+∥f−h∥L1​.​

Observe that because KKK and EEE are compact, there exists R>0R > 0R>0 such that K+E⊆B(0,R)K + E \subseteq B\p{0, R}K+E⊆B(0,R), e.g., R>sup⁡K∣x∣+sup⁡E∣x∣R > \sup_K \abs{x} + \sup_E \abs{x}R>supK​∣x∣+supE​∣x∣. Hence, by dominated convergence (1∈L1(B(0,R))1 \in L^1\p{B\p{0,R}}1∈L1(B(0,R))), there exists N∈NN \in \NN∈N such that

∫B(0,R)∣gn(y)∣ dy<ε\int_{B\p{0,R}} \abs{g_n\p{y}} \,\diff{y} < \epsilon∫B(0,R)​∣gn​(y)∣dy<ε

for all n≥Nn \geq Nn≥N. Thus,

∣(f∗gn)(x)∣≤Mε+ε,\abs{\p{f * g_n}\p{x}} \leq M\epsilon + \epsilon,∣(f∗gn​)(x)∣≤Mε+ε,

independent of xxx, which completes the proof.
